thread.title: Aubameyang stars, Dortmund routs Augsburg 5-1 in Bundesliga
thread.title_full: Aubameyang stars, Dortmund routs Augsburg 5-1 in Bundesliga

title: Aubameyang stars, Dortmund routs Augsburg 5-1 in Bundesliga
text:
Aubameyang, Kagawa star as Borussia Dortmund routs Augsburg 5-1 in Bundesliga THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   12:35 pmLast   12:35 pm   
People: 
Germany (196) 

BERLIN â€” Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scored a hat trick and Shinji Kagawa starred as Borussia Dortmund routed bottom side Augsburg 5-1 in the Bundesliga on Sunday. 
Aubameyang opened the scoring in the 18th minute and Marco Reus made it 2-0 three minutes later, when Kagawa turned a defender one way then the other before crossing for the Germany forward. 
Kagawa back-heeled the ball for Reus to claim his second in the 33rd and Aubameyang slid in to convert substitute Adrian Ramos' shot at the far post in the 85th, after Augsburg's Raul Bobadilla had reduced the deficit in the 49th. 
Kagawa provided his third assist in injury time, when Aubameyang became the first Dortmund player to score 13 goals in just 10 league games. 
Borussia Moenchengladbach was hosting Schalke in the late game.
